email.subject: Congratulations
email.body:
#PLAYERNAME#, Congratulations.
You were one of the few users selected to join our first AI monitoring tests. Every subject will have to take care and teach a AI we're working on about the Internet and much more. Since this is a new project, every subject will be monitored by a supervisor, to make sure things go right and to avoid any possible accidents.
Username: #PLAYERNAME# Reason of Invitation: Superior computer engineering skills Initial rank: Subject Assigned AI: AI-01_LC (Lillycord) What to teach: Human Emotions
To continue and get prepared for your new journey on AEGIS Laboratories please, reply this email with "i agree".
